text: Monumento del Llano Amarillo is a special structure located in Ceuta, which is a part of Spain in North Africa. It can be found at the base of Mount Hacho. This very tall statue, which is fifteen metres in height, was sent from Morocco to this place in the year 1962. It is one of the few artworks that remain and show a time in Spain's history called Nationalism, which happened the Spanish Civil War. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Spain Category:Ceuta
title: Monumento del Llano Amarillo
